title: Consumer education: who needs it?
creator_credit: Richard Wallace and William C. Crain
brief_description: An introduction to consumer problems, especially with respect to supermarkets, car selling, advertising, and credit buying. We see both angry and unconcerned customers. The major problem areas are outlined by people working in the area of consumer protection.
